KEYBINDINGS.HideUI.Name: Toggle Interface Visibility
KEYBINDINGS.HideUI.Hint: Pressing this button combination will toggle the visibility of the entire Interface. Will not affect any opened Applications (like Sheets).

SETTINGS.AutoExpandSidebar.Name: Auto Expand Sidebar
SETTINGS.AutoExpandSidebar.Hint: When checked, Sidebar will start in expanded state upon login
SETTINGS.DefaultTab.Name: Default Sidebar Tab
SETTINGS.DefaultTab.Hint: Select which Sidebar Tab should be opened with Auto Expand Sidebar setting
SETTINGS.CollapsibleHotbar.Name: Collapsible Hotbar
SETTINGS.CollapsibleHotbar.Hint: When checked, replaces "Main Menu" button with "Toggle Hotbar" button that allows Hotbar to be collapsed
SETTINGS.HotbarDefaultCollapsed.Name: Hotbar starts collapsed
SETTINGS.HotbarDefaultCollapsed.Hint: When checked, Hotbar will begin in collapsed state upon login. Requires Collapsible Hotbar setting to be enabled.
SETTINGS.HidePerformance.Name: Hide Performance Stats
SETTINGS.HidePerformance.Hint: When checked, Performance Stats in the Players HUD will be hidden
SETTINGS.LowerPauseBanner.Name: Lower Pause Banner
SETTINGS.LowerPauseBanner.Hint: When checked, Pause Banner will be moved to lower 3rd of the screen, instead being in the middle. Not guaranteed to work well with custom pause from game systems
